DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : This study describe efficacy safety Fingolimod patient treat least 6 month east France January 2011 December 2014 . Background : The Grand-Est geographical region France high prevalence multiple sclerosis ( 10000 patient registered European Database Multiple Sclerosis ( EDMUS ) database ) . In region since January 2011 , 1014 patient treat least 6 month Fingolimod , first oral therapy patient active relapsing-remitting MS. Methods : Features patient follow Grand-Est region treat fingolimod 6 university hospital , general hospital private neurologist review retrospective study identification clinical file report EDMUS database .
DOC.brief_title: Fingolimod Real World Experience : French Grand-Est Cohort
DOC.criteria: Patients MS treat Gilenya disease contraindication Gilenya treatment receive Gilenya 31st March 2014
